markdown:
| icon              = poe2_robe_armor_humility_icon.png
| description       = This frayed robe is the cassock of a disgraced priest brought low for his pride. Now it resembles a beggar's garment. The torn sackcloth is suffused with layers of dirt and sweat. The thin material offers little respite from elements.

The vestment once carried a blessing, however, and some of the divine power remains.
| added_in          = poe2

| armor_category    = Light armor
